Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object

The Controller, acts as an interface between the App's state and the GUI

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Controller getInstance()

      Gets the global instance of the Controller

      Returns:
      the global controller

    • isUserLogged

      public boolean isUserLogged()

      Checks if a User is logged in the system

      Returns:
      returns true if a user is currently logged, false otherwise

    • getLoggedUser

      public UserDTO getLoggedUser()

      Gets the current logged User's DTO

      Returns:
      if a user is logged, returns the current logged user's DTO, otherwise returns null

    • getUsers

      public Map<Integer,String> getUsers()

      Gets a Map of all the Users' pairs of userID|usernames.

      Returns:
      a Map of all userID|usernames.

    • userExists

      public int userExists(String username)

      Checks if a User exists in the system

      Parameters:
      username - the user's username
      Returns:
      if found returns the User's userID, otherwise returns -1
      Throws:
      InvalidModelAttributeException - if the username is not valid or too long

    • registerUser

      public boolean registerUser(String username, String password)

      Registers a User in the system and sets it as current User

      Parameters:
      username - the user's username
      password - the user's password
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if the user already exists in the system.
      Throws:
      InvalidModelAttributeException - if the username is not valid or either the username or password are too long
      InvalidControllerOperationException - if a User with the same username exists already

    • authenticateUser

      public int authenticateUser(String username, String password)

      Authenticates a User in the system and sets it as current User

      Parameters:
      username - the user's username
      password - the user's password
      Returns:
      0 if successful, -1 if the password is incorrect and -2 if the user is not registered in the system.
      Throws:
      InvalidModelAttributeException - if the username is not valid or either the username or password are too long

    • reloadUserData

      public void reloadUserData()

      Invalidates the current User's cached data

    • getNoticeboard

      public NoticeboardDTO getNoticeboard(int boardID)

      Gets the logged User's Noticeboard identified by boardID

      Parameters:
      boardID - the Noticeboard's ID
      Returns:
      if found, returns the noticeboard wrapped as a NoticeboardDTO, otherwise returns null

    • getNoticeboards

      public List<NoticeboardDTO> getNoticeboards()

      Gets the logged User's Noticeboards

      Returns:
      returns the noticeboards wrapped as a List of NoticeboardDTO

    • addNoticeboard

      public void addNoticeboard(NoticeboardDTO noticeboard)

      Adds a Noticeboard to the logged User

      Parameters:
      noticeboard - the noticeboard
      Throws:
      InvalidModelAttributeException - if the title is not valid, or the title or description are too long
      IllegalArgumentException - if noticeboard is null
      InvalidControllerOperationException - if a noticeboard with the same title exists already for the user

    • deleteNoticeboardByID

      public void deleteNoticeboardByID(int boardID)

      Deletes the logged User's Noticeboard

      Parameters:
      boardID - the target Noticeboard's ID
      Throws:
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the noticeboard does not exist

    • updateNoticeboard

      public void updateNoticeboard(NoticeboardDTO noticeboard)

      Updates the title and description of the logged User's Noticeboard

      Parameters:
      noticeboard - the new Noticeboard's data
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if noticeboard is null
      InvalidModelAttributeException - if the board's ID is negative, if the title is not valid or if either the title or description are too long
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the target noticeboard does not exist

    • getToDo

      public ToDo getToDo(int boardID, int todoID)

      Gets ToDo from a Noticeboard

      Parameters:
      boardID - the Noticeboard's ID
      todoID - the ToDo's ID
      Returns:
      the ToDo if the noticeboard contains it, null otherwise
      Throws:
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the target noticeboard does not exist

    • addToDo

      public void addToDo(int boardID, ToDoDTO todo)

      Adds ToDo to a Noticeboard

      Parameters:
      boardID - the board's ID
      todo - the todo
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if todo is null
      InvalidModelAttributeException - if the title is invalid or too long, or if the background color's format is not valid
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the noticeboard does not exist
      InvalidControllerOperationException - if a todo with the same title already exists in the board

    • deleteToDo

      public void deleteToDo(int boardID, int todoID)

      Deletes ToDo from the User's Noticeboard

      If the logged User is the ToDo's owner, removes ToDo from the Noticeboard of the Users who share it

      Parameters:
      boardID - the Noticeboard's ID
      todoID - the ToDo's ID
      Throws:
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the noticeboard does not exist
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the todo does not exist

    • updateCompletionState

      public void updateCompletionState(int boardID, int todoID)

      Updates the completion state of a Noticeboard's ToDo.

      Parameters:
      boardID - the target Noticeboard's ID
      todoID - the target ToDo's ID
      Throws:
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the noticeboard does not exist
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the todo does not exist

    • updateToDoTitle

      public void updateToDoTitle(int boardID, int todoID, String newTitle)

      Updates the title of a Noticeboard's ToDo.

      Parameters:
      boardID - the target Noticeboard's ID
      todoID - the target ToDo's ID
      newTitle - the new title
      Throws:
      InvalidModelAttributeException - if the new title is null, blank or invalid
      InvalidControllerOperationException - if a todo with the same title already exists
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the noticeboard does not exist
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the todo does not exist

    • updateToDoDescription

      public void updateToDoDescription(int boardID, int todoID, String newDescription)

      Updates the description of a Noticeboard's ToDo.

      Parameters:
      boardID - the target Noticeboard's ID
      todoID - the target ToDo's ID
      newDescription - the new description
      Throws:
      InvalidModelAttributeException - if the new description is too long
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the noticeboard does not exist
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the todo does not exist

    • updateToDoExpiryDate

      public void updateToDoExpiryDate(int boardID, int todoID, LocalDateTime newExpiryDate)

      Updates the expiry date of a Noticeboard's ToDo.

      Parameters:
      boardID - the target Noticeboard's ID
      todoID - the target ToDo's ID
      newExpiryDate - the new expiry date
      Throws:
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the noticeboard does not exist
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the todo does not exist

    • updateToDoActivityURL

      public void updateToDoActivityURL(int boardID, int todoID, String newActivityURL)

      Updates the activity URL of a Noticeboard's ToDo.

      Parameters:
      boardID - the target Noticeboard's ID
      todoID - the target ToDo's ID
      newActivityURL - the new activity url
      Throws:
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the noticeboard does not exist
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the todo does not exist
      InvalidModelAttributeException - if the new activity URL is too long

    • updateToDoImageURL

      public void updateToDoImageURL(int boardID, int todoID, String newImageURL)

      Updates the image URL of a Noticeboard's ToDo.

      Parameters:
      boardID - the target Noticeboard's ID
      todoID - the target ToDo's ID
      newImageURL - the new image url
      Throws:
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the noticeboard does not exist
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the todo does not exist
      InvalidModelAttributeException - if the new image URL is too long

    • updateToDoBackgroundColor

      public void updateToDoBackgroundColor(int boardID, int todoID, String newBackgroundColor)

      Updates the background color of a Noticeboard's ToDo.

      Parameters:
      boardID - the target Noticeboard's ID
      todoID - the target ToDo's ID
      newBackgroundColor - the new background color
      Throws:
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the noticeboard does not exist
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the todo does not exist
      InvalidModelAttributeException - if the new background color is not valid or too long

    • addSharedUser

      public void addSharedUser(int boardID, int todoID, String username)

      Shares a ToDo with a User.

      Parameters:
      boardID - the target Noticeboard's ID
      todoID - the target ToDo's ID
      username - the User's username
      Throws:
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the Noticeboard does not exist
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the ToDo does not exist
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the User does not exist
      InvalidControllerOperationException - if the ToDo is already shared with the User
      InvalidControllerOperationException - if the User is trying to share a ToDo with itself

    • removeSharedUser

      public void removeSharedUser(int boardID, int todoID, String username)

      Unshares a ToDo from a Noticeboard of a User.

      Parameters:
      boardID - the target Noticeboard's ID
      todoID - the target ToDo's ID
      username - the user's username
      Throws:
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the Noticeboard does not exist
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the ToDo does not exist
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the User does not exist
      InvalidControllerOperationException - if the ToDo is not shared with the User

    • moveToDoToIndex

      public void moveToDoToIndex(int boardID, int todoID, int newIndex)

      Moves a ToDo from its position in its Noticeboard to another position

      Parameters:
      boardID - the Noticeboard's ID
      todoID - the ToDo's ID
      newIndex - the new position's index
      Throws:
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the noticeboard does not exist
      InexistentModelEntityException - if the todo does not exist
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if newIndex < 0 or newIndex is bigger or equal to the Noticeboard's size

    • moveToDoToBoard

      public void moveToDoToBoard(int originBoardID, int todoID, int targetBoardID)

      Moves a ToDo from its original Noticeboard to another

      Parameters:
      originBoardID - the origin Noticeboard's ID
      todoID - the ToDo's ID
      targetBoardID - the destination Noticeboard's ID
      Throws:
      InexistentModelEntityException - if either the original or new Noticeboard do not exist, or if the todo does not exist
      InvalidControllerOperationException - if the new Noticeboard is not owned by the User
      InvalidControllerOperationException - if the destination Noticeboard already owns a ToDo with the same title
